title.en: Hyakujitsu no Bara - Luckenwalde no Heya de (Doujinshi)

description.en:
Pairing: Klaus x Taki

A side story of Maiden Rose - a peek into Taki and Claus' time spent together back in their dorm room at Luckenwalde.

1. Luckenwalde no Heya de

2. Luckenwalde no Heya de II
Chibi Taki has a fever.

3. Amaimono wa Betsubara Hen
Klaus shares his sister's honey. Taki likes sweets.

4. Shuumatsu no Sugoshikata
Klaus is a crappy spy.

5. Promise
Taki gets a present from Klaus's sister.

6. Wheel of Fortune
Back in Luckenwalde, Klaus and Taki are mourning the death of some of their companions. They go to their usual inn, and Taki meets a mysterious stranger.

7. Rosa Alba I
A new arc in the Luckenwalde era storyline, set after 'Promise' and before 'Wheel of Fortune'. An old friend comes back from the past to see Klaus...But is the visit what it seems? And how will it affect Taki?

8. Rosa Alba II
The boys go into town with Klaus's old comrade. Taki makes coffee while Klaus reminisces. And Enrico...well, who thinks he has a hidden agenda??

9. Danshou (Fragment)
Klaus and Taki spend a quiet moment in bed in their room at Luckenwalde. Very short and no dialogue at all, just a little voiceover.
